verbs.description: The issue of [ARG1: US troops] [V: stationed] [ARG2: in South Korea] will not be " on the table " at a summit this month between President Donald Trump and North Korea 's Kim Jong Un , US Defense Secretary Jim Mattis said Saturday .

The issue of US troops stationed in South Korea [V: will] not be " on the table " at a summit this month between President Donald Trump and North Korea 's Kim Jong Un , US Defense Secretary Jim Mattis said Saturday .

[ARG1: The issue of US troops stationed in South Korea] [ARGM-MOD: will] [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: be] " [ARG2: on the table "] [ARGM-LOC: at a summit this month between President Donald Trump and North Korea 's Kim Jong Un] , US Defense Secretary Jim Mattis said Saturday .

[ARG1: The issue of US troops stationed in South Korea will not be " on the table " at a summit this month between President Donald Trump and North Korea 's Kim Jong Un] , [ARG0: US Defense Secretary Jim Mattis] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: Saturday] .
